member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventLog.EventLogSettings.LogName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the event log. If or not specified, "Application" is the default.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the event log source. If or not specified, ".NET Runtime" is the default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventLog.EventLogSettings.MachineName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the machine with the event log. If or not specified, local machine is the default.
